Comment.Language: For the Commemoration of St. Rebecca:

Text.Language: Hiten nieu,/ n~te nimenra] m~Pi,~rictoc: Ierebekka nem necs/ri: P[oic a~rih~mot nan m~pi,w e~bol n~te nennobi.
Through the prayers of the beloved of Christ, Rebecca and her children, O Lord, grant us the forgiveness of our sins.
بصلوات احباء المسيح، رفقة وأولادها، يارب انعم لنا بمغفرة خطايانا.
